attributes.action: Clarify the position of EU residents currently living and working in the UK
attributes.additional_details: The Vienna Treaty in theory covers this by protecting all rights given to somebody by a treaty after that treaty is cancelled. Clarification that this would apply would allieviate the worries of EU nationals who have settled in the UK.
attributes.background:
UK residents who are EU nationals are now worried about what will happen to them and whether they'll be able to stay and work in the UK having set up businesses, lives and created jobs here. 
Clarify the situation and confirm that EU nationals will maintain their right to remain & work in the UK
